name: netshx-portfolio
description: NETSHX LTD - Cybersecurity & Tech Solutions Portfolio Website

scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd boot2root-bandits && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/boot2root-bandits && cp -r boot2root-bandits/dist/* dist/boot2root-bandits/
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build && cd boot2root-bandits && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/boot2root-bandits && cp -r boot2root-bandits/dist/* dist/boot2root-bandits/
scripts.preview:all: npm run preview & cd boot2root-bandits && npm run preview
